subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Dan LeFevour threw for 349 yards and 3 touchdowns, and Damien Linson had 186 yards receiving to help Central Michigan beat Ohio in the Mid-American Conference championship game.
snippet: Dan LeFevour threw for 349 yards and 3 touchdowns, and Damien Linson had 186 yards receiving to help Central Michigan beat Ohio in the Mid-American Conference championship game.
